Text:
Please seed a bit more than you might normally do as the 2010/2011 hunting season is upon us now, and I would REALLY like to see those hunters interested in tanning the hides of their kills be able to readily and easily get the info needed to do so.

Let's join together and make it easier for everyone to gain this fundamental knowledge of hunting, how to brain tan your harvest and use as much as possible of your kill.
